item.title: SEC says most meme coins are not securities
item.description: The Securities and Exchange Commission issued guidance Thursday evening saying it does not deem most meme coins securities under U.S. federal law.

item.title: State Street, Apollo team up to launch first of its kind private credit ETF
item.description: Wall Street is eager to provide access to private equity and credit to the masses, and ETFs are the obvious wrapper.

item.title: Why investors should stay away from Tesla and Moderna, according to one financial advisor

item.title: Buy defensive stocks as market faces 'abundant economic headwinds,' says Stifel
item.description: A potential rebound in U.S. manufacturing in February may prove to be an anomaly, according to a Stifel analyst.

item.title: Turn to these bonds to navigate market volatility â€” and get yields above 4%
item.description: Investors trying to navigate the rocky market may want to turn to a certain class of bonds to help smooth the ride.
